00045 RainbruRPG::Gui::ServerDesc::ServerDesc(FXApp *a, FXString serverName)
00046   : FXDialogBox(a, "Server description", DECOR_TITLE|DECOR_BORDER|DECOR_RESIZE)
00047 {
00048   this->resize(400, 400);
00049 
00050   // The root frame
00051   FXVerticalFrame *root =new FXVerticalFrame(this,LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00052   FXString lab1="Here is the description of the selected server.\n"
00053     "This description is read-only.";
00054   FXLabel* labHelp=new FXLabel(root, lab1, 0, LABEL_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00055 
00056   // The description field
00057   FXint txtOpts=LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y|TEXT_READONLY;
00058   FXText* txtDesc=new FXText(root, NULL, 0,txtOpts);
00059   //  txtDesc->setEditable(FALSE);
00060   txtDesc->setText(getServerDesc(serverName));
00061 
00062   // The buttons
00063   FXHorizontalFrame *btnFrame = new FXHorizontalFrame(root,LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00064   FXuint btnOpts= LAYOUT_RIGHT|BUTTON_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH ;
00065   FXint btnWidth=120;
00066   FXButton* btn2=new FXButton( btnFrame, "OK", NULL, this, ID_BTN_OK, 
00067                                BUTTON_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH, 0, 0, btnWidth);
00068 
00069 }

00095 long RainbruRPG::Gui::ServerDesc::
00096 onNotYetImplemented(FXObject * o,FXSelector s,void* v){

00113 long RainbruRPG::Gui::ServerDesc::
00114 onOkClicked(FXObject * o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00115   handle(this, FXSEL(SEL_COMMAND, FXDialogBox::ID_ACCEPT), NULL);
00116   return 1;
00117 }

00129 FXString RainbruRPG::Gui::ServerDesc::getServerDesc(FXString name){
00130   std::string n;
00131   n=StringConv::getSingleton().xmlToNewLine(name.text());
00132 
00133   xmlServerList xsl;
00134   tServerListItem* sli=xsl.getServerByName(n.c_str());
00135   FXString ret(sli->description);
00136 
00137   return ret;
00138 }
